body_html: An error in CollectiveBcastRecv indicates the problem is probably during model initialization. The size mismatch suggests the model has been set up differently at each worker. @yuefengz may be able to pinpoint the problem more exactly.
body_text: An error in CollectiveBcastRecv indicates the problem is probably during model initialization.  The size mismatch suggests the model has been set up differently at each worker.   @yuefengz may be able to pinpoint the problem more exactly.
body: An error in CollectiveBcastRecv indicates the problem is probably during model initialization.  The size mismatch suggests the model has been set up differently at each worker.   @yuefengz may be able to pinpoint the problem more exactly.
